CustomField.description: Attribute name from Product housing calculation value
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Attribute name from Product housing calculation value. Valid CPQ attributes are: 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price'. Any QuoteLineItem Field API name is also valid given that CPQ has stamped the value. Valid related objects are: 'PricebookEntry' and 'Product2' (Please enter as object.field).
CustomField.label: Product Calculation Field
